amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Children and Families Services Programs account by $3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 51 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase funding for the Children and Families Services Programs account by $3 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Adams amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 307 - 115 (Roll no. 298).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Adams amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 307 - 115 (Roll no. 298).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A049) offered by Ms. Adams.
